patthana12.1:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana12.1:3.1_1: ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana12.1:4.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:5.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana12.1:6.1_1: naadhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… nakamme ekaṁ …pe… naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṁ …pe… novigate tīṇi.
patthana12.1:7.1_0: Nanahetu nasahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana12.1:8.1_0: Nahetu nasahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana12.1:8.1_1: Nahetu nasahetuko dhammo nanahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana12.1:9.1_1: anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye upanissaye cattāri,
patthana12.1:9.1_2: purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme …pe… jhāne ekaṁ, sampayutte ekaṁ,
patthana12.1:10.1_0: Nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:10.1_1: Nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:10.1_2: Nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko ca nanahetu naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:11.1_0: Nanahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:11.1_1: Nanahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:11.1_2: Nanahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko ca nanahetu naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:12.1_0: Nahetuṁ naahetukañca nanahetuṁ naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:12.1_1: Nahetuṁ naahetukañca nanahetuṁ naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:12.1_2: Nahetuṁ naahetukañca nanahetuṁ naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko ca nanahetu naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana12.1:14.1_0: Nahetuṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana12.1:15.1_1: ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana12.1:16.1_0: Nahetuṁ nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana12.1:17.1_0: Nanahetuṁ nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana12.1:18.1_0: Nahetuṁ nahetuvippayuttañca nanahetuṁ nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana12.1:20.1_0: Nahetuṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Yāva pañhāvārepi ekaṁ.)
patthana12.1:21.1_0: Nanahetuṁ naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana12.1:22.1_0: Nahetuṁ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana12.1:23.1_0: Nanahetuṁ nahetuvippayuttañceva nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nahetuvippayutto ceva nana ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana12.1:24.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana12.1:25.1_0: Nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
